name: Netvibes Center by jMage
description:
Very minimal style for the netvibes.com Dashboard.
Perfect to follow all your Favorite YouTubeChannels.

Switch your theme to the official theme named "Lumi"
I only styled the RssModule with the normal view option. 
If you check the box "Show more details" in the RssModul.
you will get the same result as the screenshot. 
Check below if you dont know how to get the RssFeeds from Youtube etc.
